reference.title: floor, floorf, ceil, ceilf : floor and ceiling

section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: floor and floorf find the nearest integer less than or equal to x. ceil and ceilf find the nearest integer greater than or equal to x.

section.title: Returns
section.p: floor and ceil return the integer result as a double. floorf and ceilf return the integer result as a float.
